biotools.summary: DTI-Voodoo is a computational method that combines molecular features and ontology-encoded phenotypic effects of drugs with protein protein interaction networks, and uses a graph neural networks to predict drug-target interactions.

bioschemas.name: DTI-Voodoo
bioschemas.summary: DTI-Voodoo is a computational method that combines molecular features and ontology-encoded phenotypic effects of drugs with protein protein interaction networks, and uses a graph neural networks to predict drug-target interactions.
